2 #include "tf2/convert.h"

4 PoseTf Converter::convertToTfPair(const geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &pose) {
5  tf2::Vector3 v_tf;
6  tf2::Quaternion q_tf;
7 
8  tf2::convert(pose.transform.translation, v_tf);
9  tf2::convert(pose.transform.rotation, q_tf);
10 
11  return PoseTf{v_tf, q_tf};
12 }
13 
14 RPY Converter::getRPYfromQuaternion(const geometry_msgs::Quaternion &rotation) {
15  tf2::Quaternion q_tf;
16  tf2::convert(rotation, q_tf);
17  double r, p, y;
18  tf2::Matrix3x3(q_tf).getRPY(r, p, y);
19 
20  return RPY{r, p, y};
21 }
22 
23 void Converter::rotateQuaternion(geometry_msgs::Quaternion &q, const RPY &rot) {
24  tf2::Quaternion q_tf, q_rot;
25  tf2::convert(q, q_tf);
26 
27  q_rot.setRPY(rot.roll, rot.pitch, rot.yaw);
28  q_tf = q_rot * q_tf;
29 
30  tf2::convert(q_tf, q);
31 }
32 
33 void Converter::setQuaternionRotation(geometry_msgs::Quaternion &q, const RPY &rot) {
34  tf2::Quaternion q_tf;
35  tf2::convert(q, q_tf);
36  q_tf.setRPY(rot.roll, rot.pitch, rot.yaw);
37  tf2::convert(q_tf, q);
38 }

40 move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal
41 Converter::tfToMoveBaseGoal(const geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &pose) {
42  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal converted_pose;
43 
44  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.orientation.w = pose.transform.rotation.w;
45  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.orientation.x = pose.transform.rotation.x;
46  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.orientation.y = pose.transform.rotation.y;
47  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.orientation.z = pose.transform.rotation.z;
48 
49  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.position.x = pose.transform.translation.x;
50  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.position.y = pose.transform.translation.y;
51  converted_pose.target_pose.pose.position.z = pose.transform.translation.z;
52 
53  converted_pose.target_pose.header.frame_id = pose.header.frame_id;
54  converted_pose.target_pose.header.seq = pose.header.seq;
55  converted_pose.target_pose.header.stamp = pose.header.stamp;
56 
57  return converted_pose;
58 }

61 Converter::convertToTfPose(const geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &pose) {
62  tf2::Stamped<tf2::Transform> pose_tf;
63  tf2::convert(pose, pose_tf);
